PERSONA:
meet robert, a 68-year-old married white man living in a non-metropolitan area of the east south central region in the south. he is a devout protestant and born-again christian, attending religious services once a week. robert considers himself a conservative republican and is registered to vote.

despite being in his late 60s, robert still has an active online presence, using the internet about once a day. he comes from a middle-income family, earning between $30,000 and $40,000 annually. robert has some college education but did not complete a degree.

born and raised in the united states, he takes pride in his american citizenship and white non-hispanic heritage. while not currently involved in volunteer work, robert finds fulfillment in his faith, political beliefs, and family life as a married man. he enjoys the quieter pace of living in a non-metropolitan area while staying connected to the world through his daily internet usage.
